statements: DELETE FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age > 50 AND drug_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age > 60 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 123 AND patient_id = 456;
DELETE FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE drug_name = 'Placebo' AND trial_result = 'Success';
DELETE FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 101 AND manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 201 AND trial_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
